payload.title: Establish Golden Standards Reference Table
payload.description: Create reference blueprint table organized by complexity and actual quality. Include current audit scores (10.0/10 for 4 adapters), distinctive key elements, and justification for use as templates. Update benchmarks based on completed audits.
payload.notes: Updated reference table reflecting real quality evolution: metrics_adapter as maximum complexity (10.0), feedback as perfect CRUD (10.0).
